~~~ INPUT ~~~
<html>
	<head>
		< >
		<title>page title</title>
		<title>second title - THIS IS WRONG</title>
	</head>
	< ><>
	<body>
		< ><>
		<h1>PAGE BODY</h1>
	</body>
</html>
~~~ TITLE ~~~

page title

~~~ PROPERTIES ~~~

title=page title

~~~ HEAD ~~~

		< >

~~~ BODY ~~~

		< ><>
		<h1>PAGE BODY</h1>
